sections.title: Responsibility for Data Processing
sections.content: STIB-MIVB is qualified as responsible for personal data processing only for the processing of data collected by STIB-MIVB itself.

sections.title: Purposes of Data Processing
Data Collected
sections.content:
This data processing concerns the following data regarding users of services related to open data:
- First name
- Name
- Email address
- Encrypted password
- IP address
- Other professional data
- Company that employs you
- Country
- Type of access granted

sections.title: Justifications for Data Processing
sections.content: The processing of these data is based on the execution of the licence agreement for use of the Open Data platform concluded between yourself and STIB-MIVB, as well as on STIB-MIVB's legitimate interest in monitoring the application of the conditions for license reuse in order to prevent fraud and compile statistics.

sections.title: Origin of the Data
sections.content: You provide these data when you register on the Open Data platform.

sections.title: Data Sharing with Third Parties
sections.content: Our Open Data platform is hosted by a service provider, who, in this capacity, is managing the data you provide us.

sections.title: Data Retention Period
sections.content: The data are kept during a period of maximum 1 year.
